quality_assessment: The index page is well-structured and accurately reflects current Prodigy features. All links are valid, MkDocs Material features are used effectively, and the content provides a clear introduction to the tool.
positive_aspects: Clear and concise introduction explaining what Prodigy is
Effective use of MkDocs Material admonitions (tip, example, note)
Interactive Mermaid diagram illustrating workflow execution
Code annotations in the Quick Start example for clarity
Well-organized 'Key Concepts' section covering major features
Logical navigation structure with 'Next Steps' categorized by user journey
Accurate feature list matching the actual codebase capabilities
Valid Quick Start example using simplified array syntax
All internal links verified and functional
improvement_suggestions: Consider adding a brief installation instruction or link to installation guide
Could add a 'Requirements' or 'Prerequisites' section for new users
The Key Concepts section could link to respective feature pages for quick navigation

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
